Sample.Title: POST-R-001 [18R649_010]

Channel.Extract-Protocol: macrodisssection of an unstained FFPE tissue section, followed by total RNA extraction using TRIzol reagent. A cDNA library was constructed using TruSeq RNA Access Library Prep Kit (Illumina, Inc., San Diego, CA, USA) and paired-end sequencing was conducted using an HiSeq 2500 platform (Illumina Inc).

Sample.Data-Processing: All fastq format reads were assessed for quality control using FASTQC software (v0.11.8). The Illumina sequencing platform-specific adaptors and poor quality read bases were trimmed using Trim Galore (v0.4.5). The trimmed reads were mapped to the reference genome with STAR aligner (v2.6.0) and the output sam/bam files were obtained. Gene expression was quantified using RSEM (v1.2.23) normalized through DESeq2 BiocManager package (v1.20.0) Genome_build: GRCh38/hg38 Supplementary_files_format_and_content: comma-delimited text files include raw counts and FPKM values for each Sample

A cDNA library was constructed using TruSeq RNA Access Library Prep Kit (Illumina, Inc., San Diego, CA, USA) and paired-end sequencing was conducted using an HiSeq 2500 platform (Illumina Inc).

Sample.Data-Processing: All fastq format reads were assessed for quality control using FASTQC software (v0.11.8). The Illumina sequencing platform-specific adaptors and poor quality read bases were trimmed using Trim Galore (v0.4.5). The trimmed reads were mapped to the reference genome with STAR aligner (v2.6.0) and the output sam/bam files were obtained. Gene expression was quantified using RSEM (v1.2.23) normalized through DESeq2 BiocManager package (v1.20.0) Genome_build: GRCh38/hg38 Supplementary_files_format_and_content: comma-delimited text files include raw counts and FPKM values for each Sample

A cDNA library was constructed using TruSeq RNA Access Library Prep Kit (Illumina, Inc., San Diego, CA, USA) and paired-end sequencing was conducted using an HiSeq 2500 platform (Illumina Inc).

Sample.Data-Processing: All fastq format reads were assessed for quality control using FASTQC software (v0.11.8). The Illumina sequencing platform-specific adaptors and poor quality read bases were trimmed using Trim Galore (v0.4.5). The trimmed reads were mapped to the reference genome with STAR aligner (v2.6.0) and the output sam/bam files were obtained. Gene expression was quantified using RSEM (v1.2.23) normalized through DESeq2 BiocManager package (v1.20.0) Genome_build: GRCh38/hg38 Supplementary_files_format_and_content: comma-delimited text files include raw counts and FPKM values for each Sample

A cDNA library was constructed using TruSeq RNA Access Library Prep Kit (Illumina, Inc., San Diego, CA, USA) and paired-end sequencing was conducted using an HiSeq 2500 platform (Illumina Inc).

Sample.Data-Processing: All fastq format reads were assessed for quality control using FASTQC software (v0.11.8). The Illumina sequencing platform-specific adaptors and poor quality read bases were trimmed using Trim Galore (v0.4.5). The trimmed reads were mapped to the reference genome with STAR aligner (v2.6.0) and the output sam/bam files were obtained. Gene expression was quantified using RSEM (v1.2.23) normalized through DESeq2 BiocManager package (v1.20.0) Genome_build: GRCh38/hg38 Supplementary_files_format_and_content: comma-delimited text files include raw counts and FPKM values for each Sample

Series.Title: Longitudinal clinico-genomic data generation, drugable target development and multi-sites validation for drug development enhancement
Series.Summary: We report the gene expression profiles of colon cancers before and after cetuximab-based chemotherapy.
Series.Overall-Design: RNA sequencing of formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tumor tissue obtained before and after cetuximab treatment
Series.Type: Expression profiling by high throughput sequencing
